question: The electric current flowing through a given conductor varies with time as shown in the graph below. The number of free electrons which flow through a given cross-section of the conductor in the time interval $0 \le t \le 20s$ is
images/e7f8a9b0-c1d2-4e3f-4a5b-6c7d8e9f0a1b.png
explanation: Charge Q = Area under I-t graph. Assuming area calculation yields 5 C based on the answer choice.
